_comment: Notch Capsule Configuration - Universal config used by Rust, Swift, and JavaScript. Edit values to customize animation timing, sizes, and behavior. See CONFIG_README.md for details.

expand_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the expand animation - slower gives more fluid spring feel

collapse_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the collapse animation - smooth and gentle

expand_timing.description: Cubic bezier control points for expand animation (fluid spring curve)

collapse_timing.description: Cubic bezier control points for collapse animation (smooth ease out)

corner_radius.description: Corner radius in points for the notch capsule rounded corners

collapsed_width.description: Width in points when the notch is collapsed (matches notch size)

collapsed_height.description: Height in points when the notch is collapsed

expanded_width.description: Width in points when the notch is fully expanded

expanded_height.description: Height in points when the notch is fully expanded

collapsed_zone_width.description: Width in points of the hover detection zone when collapsed

collapsed_zone_height.description: Height in points of the hover detection zone when collapsed

expanded_zone_width.description: Width in points of the hover detection zone when expanded

expanded_zone_height.description: Height in points of the hover detection zone when expanded

expand_delay_ms.description: Milliseconds to wait before expanding when hovering over the notch area

collapse_delay_ms.description: Milliseconds to wait before collapsing when leaving the hover area

poll_interval_ms.description: How often in milliseconds to check mouse position (polling fallback)

level_offset.description: How many levels above main menu to place the window (higher = more on top)
